price: Kandi nta nyota uzarigiriramo ndetse nta n’ubwo uzicwa n’izuba.
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
